description.p: SheepShaver is a MacOS run-time environment that allows you to run classic MacOS applications inside the Linux multitasking environment. This means that both Linux and MacOS applications can run at the same time (usually in a window on the Linux desktop) and data can be exchanged between them.
If you are using a PowerPC-based system, applications will run at native speed (i.e. with no emulation involved). There is also a built-in PowerPC emulator for non-PowerPC systems.
